title: Enhancing Architectural Design-Construction Practical Competencies Through Critical Reflection

context.prior_knowledge: Basic architectural design and construction process comprehension
context.additional_context: Need to establish a learning environment with high work relevance for current practitioners

learning_goals: Derive and explain at least three key decision-making factors for each stage of the integrated design-construction process.
Write a critical reflection journal using real-world cases and suggest improvement directions.
Develop a design-construction scenario incorporating sustainability and social responsibility concepts.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
